title: taric should get a chroma pack
body: in celebration of gay marriage legalization in America. :^)

replies.body: Taric definitely needs some attention in the skin department, whether it's a chroma pack, or a new skin. Unfortunately, we won't be giving this guy a new look until his VU is complete.

Please give an updated status on this, I remember there was an announcement about taric in January of this year.  I really hope taric is getting something updated... Its been since August 2011 since bloodstone taric skin was released.
RiotRepertoir mentioned fairly recently that they're confident in the gameplay sense, but we're still working on his new base look.
No, dude, that design just doesnt work for Taric. Not fabulous enough.
Hehehe, that's what I'm talking about.

Is the Visual Update going to also change his skins since (apart Fifth Age) all of them are basically recolors?
While I can't say for sure, since it's not a project I'm involved in, it's likely that his skins will get some form of an update - similar to Sion.
